member.name: T:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener
member.summary: An extended XmlWriterTraceListener that starts a new file after a configured trace file size. Trace files will be numbered with a four character number suffix.

member.name: F:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.LogFileNumberCaptureName
member.summary: This is the named capture group to find the numeric suffix of a trace file

member.name: F:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.logfileSuffixExpression
member.summary: This expression is used to find the number of a trace file in its file name by searching for an underscore (_), a numeric expression with any repetitions. The named capture group named by the constant "LogFileNumberCaptureName" will contain the number.

member.name: F:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.basicTraceFileName
member.summary: The basic trace file name as it is configured in configuration file's system.diagnostics section. However, this class will append a numeric suffix to the file name (respecting the original file extension).

member.name: F:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.attributesLoaded
member.summary: This field will be used to remember whether or not we have loaded the custom attributes from the config yet. The initial value is, of course, false.

member.name: F:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.currentFileSuffixNumber
member.summary: The current numeric suffix for trace file names

member.name: F:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.maxTraceFileSizeKb
member.summary: The size in KBytes of a trace file before a new file is started. The default value is 128 Mbytes

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying the trace file name.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying the trace file name and the name of the new instance.
member.param: The name of the new instance.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.Fail(System.String)
member.summary: Emits an error message to the listener.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.Fail(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Emits an error message and a detailed message to the listener.
member.param: The detailed error message to append to the error message.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.TraceData(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.
member.param: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A numeric identifier for the event.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.TraceData(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.
member.param: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A numeric identifier for the event.
An array of data objects to emit.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.TraceEvent(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes trace and event information to the listener specific output.
member.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.TraceEvent(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the file or stream.
member.param: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A numeric identifier for the event.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.TraceEvent(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the file or stream.
member.param: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the array.
An object array containing zero or more objects to format.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.TraceTransfer(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.
member.param: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A structure that identifies a related activity.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.Write(System.Object)
member.summary: Writes the value of the object's method to the listener.
member.param: An whose fully qualified class name you want to write.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.Write(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a category name and the value of the object's method to the listener.
member.param: An whose fully qualified class name you want to write.
A category name used to organize the output.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information to the file or stream.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.Write(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a category name and a message to the listener.
member.param: A category name used to organize the output.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.WriteLine(System.Object)
member.summary: Writes the value of the object's method to the listener.
member.param: An whose fully qualified class name you want to write.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.WriteLine(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a category name and the value of the object's method to the listener.
member.param: An whose fully qualified class name you want to write.
A category name used to organize the output.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information followed by the current line terminator to the file or stream.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.WriteLine(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a category name and a message to the listener, followed by a line terminator.
member.param: A category name used to organize the output.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.GetSupportedAttributes
member.summary: Gets the custom attributes supported by the trace listener.
member.returns: A string array naming the custom attributes supported by the trace listener, or null if there are no custom attributes.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.InitFileInfo(System.String)
member.summary: The init file.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.StartNewTraceFile
member.summary: Causes the writer to start a new trace file with an increased number in the file names suffix

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.CheckTraceFile
member.summary: The reopen file.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.CloseFile
member.summary: The close file.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.OpenActualFile
member.summary: The open file.

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.GetTraceFileNumber
member.summary: Gets the trace file number by checking whether similar trace files are already existant. The method will find the latest trace file and return its number.
member.returns: The number of the latest trace file

member.name: M:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.LoadAttributes
member.summary: Reads the custom attributes' values from the configuration file. We call this method the first time the attributes are accessed. We do not do this when the listener is constructed becausethe attributes will not yet have been read from the configuration file.

member.name: P:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.CurrentTraceFileName
member.summary: Gets the name of the current trace file. It is combined from the configured trace file plus an increasing number
member.value: The name of the current trace file.

member.name: P:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.MaxTraceFileSizeKb
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the trace file.
member.value: The maximum size of the trace file.

member.name: P:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.IsRollingConditionReached
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the condition to roll over the trace file is reached.
member.value: true if the condition to roll over the trace file is reached; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:SmartFran.Seed.Logging.TraceSource.SegmentedXmlTraceListener.IsOpenFile
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether is open file.
